fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e3.equipments.heater

Interface HeaterPushImplementationI

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HeaterController

    public interface HeaterPushImplementationI
    The interface HeaterPushImplementationI declares the signatures of the method to be implemented by the heater controller to receive the sensor data from the heater in push mode.

    Description

    Invariants

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Created on : 2023-11-30

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void processHeaterState(HeaterCyPhy.HeaterState heaterState)
      receive and process the heater state coming from the heater component, starting the control loop if the state has changed from OFF to ON.
      void processTemperatures(TemperatureSensorData target, TemperatureSensorData current)
      receive and process the temperatures data pushed from the heater.

    • Method Detail

      • processHeaterState

        void processHeaterState(HeaterCyPhy.HeaterState heaterState)
        receive and process the heater state coming from the heater component, starting the control loop if the state has changed from OFF to ON.

        Contract

         pre     heaterState != null
 post    true        // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        heaterState - heater state to be received from the heater component.

      • processTemperatures

        void processTemperatures(TemperatureSensorData target,
                         TemperatureSensorData current)
        receive and process the temperatures data pushed from the heater.

        Contract

         pre     target != null && current != null
 post    true        // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        target - target temperature of the thermostat.
        current - current room temperature.
